scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version patch && npm run publish && npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version minor && npm run publish && npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version major && npm run publish && npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m 'Publishing new version'
scripts.tag:
PACKAGE_VERSION=$(sed -n '/"version"/s/[^0-9.]//gp' package.json | tr -d '
') && git tag -a v$PACKAGE_VERSION -m 'Releasing version v$PACKAGE_VERSION'
